title: Human Resources (HR) Internship
companyName: Burger Singh - A unit of Tipping Mr Pink Pvt Ltd
description:
As a Human Resources intern at Tipping Mr. Pink Private Limited, you will have the exciting opportunity to gain hands-on experience in recruitment, employee relations, and HR administration. Your role will be instrumental in supporting our HR team, while also learning key skills to kickstart your career in HR.

Key Responsibilities


 * Assist in recruitment processes, including candidate sourcing, scheduling interviews, and conducting reference checks.
 * Support employee onboarding and orientation activities to ensure a smooth transition for new hires.
 * Maintain HR records and databases, ensuring accuracy and confidentiality of employee information.
 * Assist in organizing and coordinating training and development programs for employees.
 * Handle employee inquiries and provide support on HR-related policies and procedures.
 * Collaborate with the HR team on special projects and initiatives to improve HR processes.
 * Utilize MS-Excel and MS-Office skills to create reports and analyze HR data for decision-making purposes.
   
   

If you are a proactive and detail-oriented individual with strong English proficiency (both spoken and written), and eager to learn and grow in the field of HR, we encourage you to apply for this exciting internship opportunity at Tipping Mr. Pink Private Limited. Join us as we work towards creating a positive and engaging work environment for our employees!

About Company: Tipping Mr. Pink is the holding company for the fusion burger chain, 'Burger Singh'. Our aim is to serve high-quality and value-for-money burgers in Indian flavors and spices. Burger Singh has successfully opened multiple outlets in Gurgaon and Delhi and has been included in the list of '50 Hot Startups of 2017'.

title: Market Research Internship
description:
As a market research intern, you will play a crucial role in expanding our outlet network within a designated geographic area. Your responsibilities will include identifying and adding new outlets, ensuring accurate data capture, and contributing to the overall project management efforts. This role requires a proactive attitude, strong project management skills, and a dedication to excellence throughout the internship period.

Selected Intern's Day-to-day Responsibilities Include


 * Identify and add new outlets within designated LPS towns and rural areas
 * Capture outlet data accurately and comprehensively using provided tools
 * Travel extensively within the assigned geography to execute the project effectively
 * Communicate fluently in the local language (reading, speaking, and writing)
 * Collaborate with team members to ensure project objectives are met
   
   

Note: Candidates will receive travel reimbursement, along with compensation of ₹3500-5000 per distributor covered throughout the internship period, based on performance. We expect the intern to cover one distributor each week to be eligible for the stipend.

About Company: Cavinkare Private Limited is one of the pioneers in FMCG products. It has a strong distribution footprint in PAN India, reaching more than a million outlets through more than 6000 stockists. Leveraging its strong distribution network, CavinKare has entered into strategic partnerships with Coty for Adidas and Jovan brands and Hawpar International for Tiger Balm. CavinKare has replicated the success at home and in foreign lands as well. We serve consumers in more than 13 countries with a focus on South Asia, Southeast Asia, and GCC countries.

Trends in Vogue Private Limited, a CavinKare initiative came into being in July 2002, with the sole purpose of offering customers the best grooming solutions. It operates two successful salon chains - Limelite and Green Trends. Both brands have expanded across the country delighting customers with its array of hair and skin services.

title: Software Engineer, Intern
description:
Who we are

About Stripe

Stripe is a financial infrastructure platform for businesses. Millions of companies—from the world’s largest enterprises to the most ambitious startups—use Stripe to accept payments, grow their revenue, and accelerate new business opportunities. Our mission is to increase the GDP of the internet, and we have a staggering amount of work ahead. That means you have an unprecedented opportunity to put the global economy within everyone’s reach while doing the most important work of your career.

About The Team

Our internship program will provide an opportunity to work on meaningful products that will grow the GDP of the internet. Through the internship, you will work with many systems and technologies, gain experience in systems design and testing, and have opportunities to present your work to your team and the wider org. Each intern has a dedicated intern manager, and every project is part of the team’s roadmap and will directly help Stripe’s mission.

What you’ll do

Every internship at Stripe centers around a real, legitimate project that our customers urgently need, touching many parts of our operations and stack. We will support you in shipping it. Yes, you will actually ship it. Some recent projects include rebuilding our statistics aggregation service, building new service discovery systems, and many user facing projects like making it easy to understand error messages on Stripe Checkout. As a Stripe intern, you'll be tackling important projects to increase global commerce, while working alongside exceptional people who insist on doing their best work. You’ll learn from people with high standards who are great at inspiring others to do more and go further. We value technical and personal growth, and see our internship program as a vehicle to foster both.

Responsibilities


 * Write software that will be used in production, and has meaningful impact to Stripe
 * Give and receive technical feedback through code reviews or design discussions
 * Collaborate with other engineers and cross-functional stakeholders to proactively seek and incorporate feedback
 * Learn quickly by asking great questions, by working with your intern manager and teammates effectively, and by communicating the status of your work clearly
   
   
   

Who you are

We’re looking for someone who meets the minimum requirements to be considered for the role. If you meet these requirements, you are encouraged to apply. The preferred qualifications are a bonus, not a requirement.

Minimum Requirements


 * A strong fundamental understanding of computer science through pursuit of a Bachelor’s, Master’s, or PhD degree in computer science, math, or a related discipline
 * Some experience and familiarity with programming, either through side projects or classwork. We work mostly in Java, Ruby, JavaScript, Scala, and Go. We believe new programming languages can be learned if the fundamentals and general knowledge are present
 * Experience from previous internships or other multi-person projects, including open source contributions, that demonstrate evaluating and receiving feedback from mentors, peers, and stakeholders
 * Ability to learn unfamiliar systems and form an understanding of those systems, through independent research and working with a mentor and subject matter experts
   
   
   

Preferred Qualifications


 * At least 2 years of university education, or equivalent work experience
 * One or more areas of specialized knowledge balanced with general skills and knowledge, such as knowing more frontend technologies and, at a high level, how a service handles an HTTP request
 * Understanding and some experience writing high quality pull requests, with good test coverage, and working knowledge to complete projects with minimal defects
 * Familiarity with navigating and managing your work in new code bases, with multiple languages
 * Ability to write clearly to explain your work to stakeholders, team members, and other Stripes
   
   
   

In-office expectations

Office-assigned Stripes in most of our locations are currently expected to spend at least 50% of the time in a given month in their local office or with users. This expectation may vary depending on role, team and location. For example, Stripes in our Bucharest, Romania site have an 80% in-office expectation, and those in Stripe Delivery Center roles in Mexico City, Mexico and Bengaluru, India work 100% from the office. Also, some teams have greater in-office attendance requirements, to appropriately support our users and workflows, which the hiring manager will discuss. This approach helps strike a balance between bringing people together for in-person collaboration and learning from each other, while supporting flexibility when possible.

Pay and benefits

Stripe does not yet include pay ranges in job postings in every country. Stripe strongly values pay transparency and is working toward pay transparency globally.
sector: Software Development, Financial Services, and Technology, Information and Internet

title: Human Resources (HR) Internship
companyName: Burger Singh - A unit of Tipping Mr Pink Pvt Ltd
description:
As a Human Resources intern at Tipping Mr. Pink Private Limited, you will have the exciting opportunity to gain hands-on experience in recruitment, employee relations, and HR administration. Your role will be instrumental in supporting our HR team, while also learning key skills to kickstart your career in HR.

Key Responsibilities


 * Assist in recruitment processes, including candidate sourcing, scheduling interviews, and conducting reference checks.
 * Support employee onboarding and orientation activities to ensure a smooth transition for new hires.
 * Maintain HR records and databases, ensuring accuracy and confidentiality of employee information.
 * Assist in organizing and coordinating training and development programs for employees.
 * Handle employee inquiries and provide support on HR-related policies and procedures.
 * Collaborate with the HR team on special projects and initiatives to improve HR processes.
 * Utilize MS-Excel and MS-Office skills to create reports and analyze HR data for decision-making purposes.
   
   

If you are a proactive and detail-oriented individual with strong English proficiency (both spoken and written), and eager to learn and grow in the field of HR, we encourage you to apply for this exciting internship opportunity at Tipping Mr. Pink Private Limited. Join us as we work towards creating a positive and engaging work environment for our employees!

About Company: Tipping Mr. Pink is the holding company for the fusion burger chain, 'Burger Singh'. Our aim is to serve high-quality and value-for-money burgers in Indian flavors and spices. Burger Singh has successfully opened multiple outlets in Gurgaon and Delhi and has been included in the list of '50 Hot Startups of 2017'.

title: HR Management Trainee Internship
description:
Selected Intern's Day-to-day Responsibilities Include


 * Developing awareness of current HR processes and policies during the first three months
 * Assisting the HR Ops team in executing annual goals across the organization
 * Working towards ensuring a strong onboarding process and smooth exits
 * Independently handling the onboarding and exit process after six months
 * Collaborating closely with HR Ops Leads throughout Q2 and Q3 to enhance employee engagement and performance practices
 * Gathering and analyzing employee data, and sharing insights with relevant stakeholders and leadership on a weekly, monthly, quarterly, or ad-hoc basis
   
   

About Company: Droom is a pure tech and product company disrupting 140-year-old automobile retailing with its proprietary technology platform, data science, and ecosystem of products for end-to-end services for automobile e-commerce. We operate like a true Silicon Valley tech startup. We are a merit-based organization with no politics, no hierarchies, no discrimination, and an open-door policy. Droom was founded by Sandeep Aggarwal, who founded two unicorn back-to-back companies, ShopClues in 2010 & Droom in 2014, after a rich experience as an internet equity research analyst in Silicon Valley and working with Schwab.com and Microsoft at their headquarters in the USA.

title: Market Research Internship
description:
Selected Intern's Day-to-day Responsibilities Include


 * Conduct primary and secondary research to gather data on market trends and consumer behavior.
 * Analyze research findings to identify patterns, opportunities, and market needs.
 * Prepare detailed reports that interpret data and provide actionable insights.
   
   

About Company: Cavinkare Private Limited is one of the top brand in FMCG Products.Starting our journey with Chik Shampoo, a landmark innovation that democratized the use of shampoos among the masses in India, CavinKare has become

a legendary player in the Personal Care space. The Personal Care brand portfolio consists of Shampoos (Chik, Meera, and Nyle), Hairwash Powders (Meera & Karthika), Coconut Oil (Meera), Fairness Creams (Fairever), Deodorant and Talc (Spinz), Hair Colours (Indica Herbal Hair Colour, Indica 10 Minutes Herbal Hair Colour, Nyle Henna & Raaga Professional).

title: Product Analyst - Intern
description:
What You'll Do

As a member of Data & Analytics squad you will be reporting to the Personal Productivity portfolio. Role will require you to work across multiple squads and engage different stakeholders to provide insights for data driven decision making on wide ranging use cases. The ideal candidate will ensure that our Data & Analytics team aligns to the business objectives and supports key initiatives for the squads and portfolio. We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented candidate who will assist in gathering requirements, shaping dashboards, analysing data trends, and managing stakeholder relationships.

Key Responsibilities:


 * Data Analysis and Reporting on trends and insights. Report on analysis findings to stakeholders, highlighting the impact on their projects.
 * Engage with stakeholders to ensure their needs are captured. Maintain clear communication with stakeholders throughout the project lifecycle.
 * Participate in squad level agile ceremonies, contribute to project planning and prioritization. Stay updated with best practices in data analytics and product management.
   
   

YOU'RE GOOD AT


 * Translating business needs and requirements into user stories
 * Strong analytical skills and attention to detail
 * Verbal and written communication, proficient in drafting clear and concise reports
 * Working with a multicultural distributed agile team located in different time zones
 * Ability to work independently and as part of a team
   
   

You Bring (experience & Qualifications)


 * Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in Business, Data Analytics, Computer Science, or a related field.
 * Exposure to data analysis tools (e.g., Excel, SQL) and visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI).
 * Please note this position is not restricted solely to the responsibilities listed above and that the job scope and responsibilities are subject to change
   
   

YOU'LL WORK WITH

Our business management and operations team members work to ensure that BCG is running smoothly, efficiently, and productively. We are made up of executive and administrative (or case team) assistants, visual service artists, receptionists, facilities staff, and the team leaders and office coordinators who manage these operations and business management jobs.

title: Event Management Internship
description:
Selected Intern's Day-to-day Responsibilities Include


 * Assist in planning and executing both small and large-scale events, ensuring all details are flawlessly managed
 * Coordinate with various vendors, suppliers, and clients to ensure seamless event operations
 * Help in creating and managing event budgets, tracking expenses, and ensuring cost-effective solutions
 * Collaborate with the team to develop event concepts, themes, and innovative ideas, ensuring client satisfaction
 * Assist in venue selection, negotiating contracts, and managing logistics for smooth event execution
 * Aid in coordinating event schedules, timelines, and production requirements for various event elements
 * Contribute to post-event evaluations, analyzing success factors, and identifying areas for improvement
   
   

About Company: We are an event planning & management company based out of South Delhi. We are into corporate events, private parties, and weddings. Our founder is a CA and lawyer, following his passion to grow his brand since 2019. He believes in growing with the people.

title: Product Analyst - Intern
description:
What You'll Do

As a member of the Personal Productivity-Mobile squad, you will be reporting to the Personal Productivity portfolio. The role will require you to engage with stakeholders across multiple squads to assist in product development and management. The ideal candidate will ensure that our squad aligns with business objectives and supports key initiatives for the portfolio. We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented candidate who will work closely with the Product Owner-Director of the Mobile Squad in gathering requirements, shaping product strategies, and managing stakeholder relationships.

Key Responsibilities:


 * Work with the squad in delivering business results and customer value across various stakeholder groups and functions. Develop OKRs and KPIs to measure and track progress.
 * Engage with stakeholders to ensure their needs are captured. Maintain clear communication with stakeholders throughout the project lifecycle.
 * Provide key input in the prioritization of the backlog across multiple products, ensuring maximum value delivered to our stakeholders.
 * Participate in squad-level agile ceremonies, contributing to project planning and prioritization.
 * Assist with the preparation and planning of initiatives during the Quarterly and Annual Business Reviews.
   
   

YOU'RE GOOD AT


 * Translating business needs and requirements into user stories.
 * Delivering results within a fast-paced, complex, multi-disciplinary organization.
 * Demonstrating strong analytical skills and attention to detail.
 * Managing competing and fluctuating priorities, working effectively with ambiguity.
 * Keeping multiple workstreams moving with minimal direction.
 * Verbal and written communication, proficient in drafting clear and concise reports.
 * Working with a multicultural, distributed agile team located in different time zones.
   
   

You Bring (experience & Qualifications)


 * Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in Business, Management, Computer Science, or a related field.
 * Exposure to Scrum and other Agile ways of working.
 * Exceptional communication and stakeholder management skills
 * Please note this position is not restricted solely to the responsibilities listed above and that the job scope and responsibilities are subject to change
   
   

YOU'LL WORK WITH

Our business management and operations team members work to ensure that BCG is running smoothly, efficiently, and productively. We are made up of executive and administrative (or case team) assistants, visual service artists, receptionists, facilities staff, and the team leaders and office coordinators who manage these operations and business management jobs.

 * Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in Business Administration
 * Organizational skills, interpersonal skills, and facilitation skills
 * Strong communication skills, both verbal and written
 * Bachelor's degree or equivalent required.
 * Intermediate skills in MS Excel, PowerPoint, Word
   
   

YOU'LL WORK WITH

Our business management and operations team members work to ensure that BCG is running smoothly, efficiently, and productively. We are made up of executive and administrative (or case team) assistants, visual service artists, receptionists, facilities staff, and the team leaders and office coordinators who manage these operations and business management jobs.

title: Product Analyst - Intern
description:
What You'll Do

We are looking for a passionate intern to join us in our Digital Transformation journey. The Consulting Productivity Pathfinders squad focuses on improving the working experience of BCG consulting teams by addressing their major pain points and finding opportunities for optimization. The squad is prioritizing the use of Generative AI tools to enhance BCG's productivity and is responsible for:


 * Managing a selection of GenAI enterprise tools
 * Continuously evaluating through POCs and pilots new GenAI tools that have a high potential to improve productivity of our consulting teams
 * Ideating and identifying new opportunities to build new GenAI products
   
   

The Intern will engage in product management activities, market scouting, user research, POCs and pilots, and collaborating with other squads when needed, and uses a data-driven approach to help in the prioritization of products and backlog.

Key Responsibilities:


 * Product Management Support: Assist the Product Owner and Product Analysts in activities related to GenAI product management and innovation sprints.
 * Stakeholder Engagement: Effectively engage with stakeholders and collaborate with other teams throughout the project lifecycle to ensure alignment and successful delivery.
 * Market Scouting: Conduct market scouting to identify new opportunities for innovation and growth.
 * Agile Participation: Participate in squad-level agile ceremonies, contribute to project planning and prioritization, and stay updated with best practices in product management and user research.
 * Data Analysis and Reporting: Analyze data to identify trends, patterns, and insights that inform product decisions and strategies. Create detailed reports and presentations for stakeholders.
 * User Experience Research: Conduct user experience research to gather insights on user needs and behaviors, ensuring that product features and enhancements align with user expectations.
   
   

YOU'RE GOOD AT


 * Translating business needs and requirements into user stories
 * Strong analytical skills and attention to detail
 * Verbal and written communication, proficient in drafting clear and concise reports
 * Working with a multicultural distributed agile team located in different time zones
 * Ability to work independently and as part of a team
   
   

You Bring (experience & Qualifications)


 * Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in Business (MBA), Data Analytics or a related field
 * Please note this position is not restricted solely to the responsibilities listed above and that the job scope and responsibilities are subject to change
   
   

YOU'LL WORK WITH

Our business management and operations team members work to ensure that BCG is running smoothly, efficiently, and productively. We are made up of executive and administrative (or case team) assistants, visual service artists, receptionists, facilities staff, and the team leaders and office coordinators who manage these operations and business management jobs.

title: Graphic Design Internship
description:
Are you a talented Graphic Design intern ready to take on exciting projects with a dynamic team at Unipro company? We are looking for someone who is proficient in Adobe Photoshop, Video Editing, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Creative Suite, and Canva. As our Graphic Design intern, you will have the opportunity to work on various design projects, collaborate with our creative team, and bring fresh ideas to the table.

Key Responsibilities


 * Create visually stunning graphics for social media, website, and marketing materials.
 * Assist in video editing and production for promotional videos and presentations.
 * Collaborate with team members to develop creative concepts and designs.
 * Support the marketing team with any additional design needs.
   
   

If you are passionate about design, eager to learn, and ready to make an impact, apply now to join our team at Unipro company!

About Company: Unipro is an e-commerce startup based in Noida. We have recently launched a brand in the pet toys category and need interns for working in the creative/design department.

description:

 * Scheduling calls
 * Working on-campus recruitment
 * Handling telephonic interviews

The squad is prioritizing the use of Generative AI tools to enhance BCG's productivity and is responsible for:


 * Managing a selection of GenAI enterprise tools
 * Continuously evaluating through POCs and pilots new GenAI tools that have a high potential to improve productivity of our consulting teams
 * Ideating and identifying new opportunities to build new GenAI products
   
   

The Intern will engage in product management activities, market scouting, user research, POCs and pilots, and collaborating with other squads when needed, and uses a data-driven approach to help in the prioritization of products and backlog.

Key Responsibilities:


 * Product Management Support: Assist the Product Owner and Product Analysts in activities related to GenAI product management and innovation sprints.
 * Stakeholder Engagement: Effectively engage with stakeholders and collaborate with other teams throughout the project lifecycle to ensure alignment and successful delivery.
 * Market Scouting: Conduct market scouting to identify new opportunities for innovation and growth.
 * Agile Participation: Participate in squad-level agile ceremonies, contribute to project planning and prioritization, and stay updated with best practices in product management and user research.
 * Data Analysis and Reporting: Analyze data to identify trends, patterns, and insights that inform product decisions and strategies. Create detailed reports and presentations for stakeholders.
 * User Experience Research: Conduct user experience research to gather insights on user needs and behaviors, ensuring that product features and enhancements align with user expectations.
   
   

YOU'RE GOOD AT


 * Translating business needs and requirements into user stories
 * Strong analytical skills and attention to detail
 * Verbal and written communication, proficient in drafting clear and concise reports
 * Working with a multicultural distributed agile team located in different time zones
 * Ability to work independently and as part of a team
   
   

You Bring (experience & Qualifications)


 * Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in Business (MBA), Data Analytics or a related field
 * Please note this position is not restricted solely to the responsibilities listed above and that the job scope and responsibilities are subject to change
   
   

YOU'LL WORK WITH

Our business management and operations team members work to ensure that BCG is running smoothly, efficiently, and productively. We are made up of executive and administrative (or case team) assistants, visual service artists, receptionists, facilities staff, and the team leaders and office coordinators who manage these operations and business management jobs.

title: Market Research Internship
description:
As a market research intern, you will play a crucial role in expanding our outlet network within a designated geographic area. Your responsibilities will include identifying and adding new outlets, ensuring accurate data capture, and contributing to the overall project management efforts. This role requires a proactive attitude, strong project management skills, and a dedication to excellence throughout the internship period.

Selected Intern's Day-to-day Responsibilities Include


 * Identify and add new outlets within designated LPS towns and rural areas
 * Capture outlet data accurately and comprehensively using provided tools
 * Travel extensively within the assigned geography to execute the project effectively
 * Communicate fluently in the local language (reading, speaking, and writing)
 * Collaborate with team members to ensure project objectives are met
   
   

Note: Candidates will receive travel reimbursement, along with compensation of ₹3500-5000 per distributor covered throughout the internship period, based on performance. We expect the intern to cover one distributor each week to be eligible for the stipend.

About Company: Cavinkare Private Limited is one of the pioneers in FMCG products. It has a strong distribution footprint in PAN India, reaching more than a million outlets through more than 6000 stockists. Leveraging its strong distribution network, CavinKare has entered into strategic partnerships with Coty for Adidas and Jovan brands and Hawpar International for Tiger Balm. CavinKare has replicated the success at home and in foreign lands as well. We serve consumers in more than 13 countries with a focus on South Asia, Southeast Asia, and GCC countries.

Trends in Vogue Private Limited, a CavinKare initiative came into being in July 2002, with the sole purpose of offering customers the best grooming solutions. It operates two successful salon chains - Limelite and Green Trends. Both brands have expanded across the country delighting customers with its array of hair and skin services.

About Company: Six Red Marbles India (formerly known as Jouve India) started in 2005 and is based in Chennai. The organization is part of the US-based company, Six Red Marbles - one of the largest providers of learning experience design, content development, educational technology, and publishing services. We are an end-to-end provider of publishing and learning solutions focused on the creation, management, re-purposing, and distribution of content and information. We provide publishing and rich media services for scientific, technical, healthcare, education, and trade books to over 60 publishers across the world - and help them publish faster, smarter, and better. We also provide technology driven services and solutions to various clients based on the strengths we have built over our close to 20 years of experience.

title: HR Technical Recruiter Intern
description:
About Rapido




We are India’s largest bike-taxi platform, steadily venturing into Delivery, Cabs, Auto, Rental and more. Currently present in over 100 cities, we are growing close to 500% year-on-year with steady funding. We have changed the concept of intra-city travel and made last-mile connectivity affordable to all. Along with being the #1 choice of 10 million people, we have also built a solid captain base of over 5 million registered captains, who have bettered their lives with Rapido. As an employer, we provide a lot of ownership to our team members providing multiple avenues for them to grow within the company. You will only grow with us with the right balance of ambition, fun, and transparent work culture!




Rapido Cabs made its debut on May 2023, marking the commencement of its services in eight cities. Notably, Hyderabad, Bangalore, and Delhi stand out as the primary cities for this initial launch. However, the ambitious plan includes an extensive expansion to encompass over 50 cities in the coming 12 months.




We are not an option; we are a choice!







Job Summary: IT & Non-IT - Intern Recruiter

We are seeking a dynamic and results-oriented IT & Non-IT recruiter who has prior internship experience on sourcing from varouis platforms.




Job Responsibilities:

Manage multiple employee programs and build sustainable scalable models through various events, webinars, and activities

Collaborate with various employee resource groups and align on execution efforts

Take a data-driven approach to benefits and engagement which includes driving survey results and measuring the impact and effectiveness of related programs continuously







Key Responsibilities:

 * Recruitment: Source, screen, and recruit candidates for both IT and non-IT roles, ensuring a strong pipeline of qualified candidates.
 * Event Coordination: Plan and execute events,R&R, webinars, and activities aimed at enhancing employee engagement and benefits.
 * Prior working experience in any cosultancy , HR, or any customer-facing role
 * Good Understanding on IT and NON IT hiring
 * Excellent verbal and written communication skills
 * Mandate - Good understanding on using Portal Naukri & Linkedin in prior org during internship
 * Pls note we are only looking for candidates who has past internship experience into recruitment and are based out of Bangalore as this will be work from office role -BLR




How to Apply

Please share resume to bharti.jaiswal@rapido.bike , resume which has past intern exp on recruitment will be shortlisted for review

Note: We are looking for Bangalore-based candidates who can join immediately.







Excited to solve challenges in the mobility space? Join Rapido & chase bigger milestones too!

title: Social Media Marketing - Intern
description:
At Teleport, we believe in making the visa process a breeze, not a headache. That's why we've

built a tech platform that automates everything from collecting info to payment at Teleport (useteleport.com)




We're a passionate team of globetrotters, visa whisperers, and meme enthusiasts who believe that no one should miss out on an adventure because of paperwork. If you’re someone who can turn travel woes into wows with your social media wizardry, we want you!




What You’ll Do:

 * Craft and Curate: Create scroll-stopping content across platforms like Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, and Facebook. If it’s a boomerang of a passport stamp, a viral travel hack, or a #ThrowbackThursday to your last beach trip, we’re all ears (and eyes)!
 * Memes & Dreams: Channel your inner meme lord/lady and come up with hilarious, relatable travel content that makes our audience hit that “share” button.
 * Engage Like a Pro: Respond to comments, messages, and DMs faster than a jet plane. Keep our community buzzing with travel tips, visa info, and teleportation (well, almost).
 * Trendspotting: Stay ahead of the curve by identifying the latest trends in social media and travel.
 * Data Detective: Keep an eye on the numbers! Track engagement, growth, and the occasional viral post. Report on what’s working, and what’s just a turbulence.
 * Collaborate: Work with our marketing and design teams to launch campaigns that make people say, “Wow, Teleport just gets me




Who You Are:

 * A social media junkie with a passion for travel and an eye for aesthetics.
 * You speak emoji fluently and know your hashtags from your @s.
 * A creative storyteller who can turn a visa application process into a thrilling saga.
 * You're organized, but know that the best ideas sometimes come from a bit of chaos.
 * A proactive learner who’s always down for a new challenge (or a viral dance challenge).
 * You’ve got a sense of humor—because if we can’t laugh at travel delays, what can we laugh at?




Duration: 3-6 months




Location: Bangalore




How to Apply:

Send us links to your social media profiles or social media work you may have done in the past. If you don't have these, just send us a post you'd do on one of our social media profiles to nikita@useteleport.com

About Company: Saregama India Limited, an RP Sanjiv Goenka Group company is India's oldest music label, youngest film studio, and multi-language TV content producer. It owns India's largest catalog of music IP of over 130K songs across languages and produces films under the brand of Yoodlee Films. Saregama also owns and retails the digital music player Carvaan. Carvaan is a perfect blend of digital technology and a retro form factor. Saregama's film production house Yoodlee Films is the country's youngest boutique film production studio that has over twenty films over the last three years. Over the last 20 years, Saregama has created over 6k hours of content for Sun TV and at any given time broadcasts 3-4 serials creating around 15-16 hours of content per week.

title: Intern - Content
description:
About Groww:

We are a passionate group of people focused on making financial services accessible to every Indian through a multi-product platform. Each day, we help millions of customers take charge of their financial journey. Customer obsession is in our DNA. Every product, every design, and every algorithm down to the tiniest detail is executed keeping the customers’ needs and convenience in mind. Our people are our greatest strength. Everyone at Groww is driven by ownership, customer-centricity, integrity, and the passion to constantly challenge the status quo.




Are you as passionate about defying conventions and creating something extraordinary as we are? Let’s chat.




Our Vision:

Every individual deserves the knowledge, tools, and confidence to make informed financial decisions. At Groww, we are making sure every Indian feels empowered to do so through a cutting-edge multi-product platform offering a variety of financial services.




Our long-term vision is to become the trusted financial partner for millions of Indians.




Our Values:

Our culture enables us to be what we are — India’s fastest-growing financial services company. Everyone at Groww enjoys the autonomy and flexibility to bring their best work to the table, as well as craft a promising career for themselves.




The values that form our foundation are:

 * Radical customer centricity
 * Ownership-driven culture
 * Keeping everything simple
 * Long-term thinking
 * Complete transparency




Role and Responsibilities:

 * Working on Groww Digest properties – Daily, Weekly, and all upcoming digest properties.
 * Write compelling, impactful copies on various personal finance topics and stock-related topics.
 * Review the performance of content regularly and improvise accordingly to stay ahead of the industry.
 * Write research-intensive and factually correct communications for our users.
 * Keep track of the stock markets regularly and be steadfast in contributing ideas.
 * Keep an eye out for regulatory and policy changes in the industry.
 * Communicate with different teams within the company to align content requirements.
 * Contribute ideas to build new content properties.
 * Evaluate existing properties and suggest changes.




External Skills And Expertise:

 * Solid understanding of the stock market and personal finance.
 * Bachelors in any degree (finance preferred but not mandatory)
 * Strong command of English grammar.
 * Ability to understand and write complex financial concepts in simple and easy-to-understand language.
 * Ability to spot news/trends and identify moment marketing strategies.
 * Good research skills.
 * Creative writing style with a customer-friendly approach.
 * Good interpersonal and communication skills.
 * Eye for detail and factual correctness.

sector: Media Production and Movies, Videos, and Sound

title: Industrial Trainee - Testing & Monitoring
description:
Industrial Trainee - Testing & Monitoring




About the Team: -




The PhonePe Financial Services Compliance team plays a critical role in the successful execution of the firm & compliance mission. The Compliance function ensures the development and maintenance of a strong compliance culture by developing and maintaining program infrastructure that identifies, measures and monitors compliance with applicable laws, regulations and rules that govern our business globally.




Compliance teams work closely with business, legal, risk, and audit functions to provide expertise on regulatory compliance matters, assess and measure compliance and related risks, and monitor and test the adequacy of the firm & compliance control environment. The Associate Manager Compliance

Testing role is relatively new within the PhonePe Compliance & Regulatory Management team with responsibility for oversight of consistent implementation of policies & practices whilst ensuring country nuances are adopted to consider local laws and regulations. Such practices will include a common approach and framework for risk assessment, monitoring, testing and surveillance activities.




The Compliance Testing Industrial Trainee is responsible for the timely and effective management and execution of the Compliance Testing program. As a member of the PhonePe Compliance Testing team, the individual reports into the Manager, Compliance and will be based in Bangalore, India. The individual should have flair for audit or compliance monitoring/testing with a strong risk and control mindset, keen awareness and interest in Data Analytics and is responsible to assess compliance with regulations and policies through reviews conducted across the various product types and instrument types used or issued within PhonePe and affiliated businesses.




Roles and Responsibilities:




 * Contribute and point-out risks of the product/service during pre-planning work.
 * Prepare the control checklist required for the review for each regulatory and unregulated functions
 * Designing work programs and executing steps, meeting deadlines to evaluate compliance with rules and regulations.
 * Interacting with senior heads of business and compliance as part of scoping, control design assessment, reporting findings and offering solutions to address control gaps or enhance processes.
 * Formulate questions to be asked during walkthroughs and lead walkthroughs when called upon
 * Identify controls after attending a walkthrough, specifically those related to the risks noted
 * Provide rough drafts of issue documentation, identifying the important parts required.
 * Define testing scripts, coordinate with respective development teams to run the same during the review process and evaluate the outcome along with the manager.




Role Requirements:




 * Good eye for detailing with respect to each product regulations and controls
 * Inclination and focus on Controls Testing (which very importantly includes (i) assessing the design of controls, and (ii) whether the controls are operating effectively) would be a good candidate. The would be the key & critical foundation. Basic AML/ OFAC experience would be preferred.
 * Passion for technical compliance and be interested in conducting wide-scale investigative reviews.
 * Have a good appreciation of the regulations applicable in India and APAC.
 * Highly detail-oriented, motivated, curious individual with good time-management skills, analytical and communication skills
 * Quick and sharp individual who relishes the challenges of understanding and interpreting regulations and processes across different businesses and jurisdictions.
 * Strong communication, interpersonal and influencing skills. The candidate should have the ability to establish credibility and strong partnerships with senior business leaders, control functions and corporate partners globally.
 * Fluency in written and spoken English is a must have. Excellent written skills, and ability to prepare clear, concise reports with minimal supervision.
 * Have an audit and / or relevant industry qualifications, or a university degree.
 * Proficiency in Excel and SQL is a preferred skill to have.

description:
As an administration/operations Intern at The Chef Pâtissier, you will have the opportunity to work closely with our team to gain hands-on experience in the culinary industry. We are looking for someone who is passionate about email marketing, has strong spoken and written English skills, and is proficient in Google Workspace.

 * Assist in creating and implementing email marketing campaigns to promote our products and services.
 * Manage and respond to customer inquiries and feedback through email and other communication channels.
 * Help with general administrative tasks such as scheduling appointments, organizing files, and updating spreadsheets.
 * Support the operations team in coordinating, managing inventory, and ensuring smooth day-to-day operations.

title: Digital Marketing Internship
description:
As a Digital Marketing intern at Ganpati Management Services, you will have the opportunity to work on a variety of exciting projects and gain hands-on experience in the field.

Selected Intern's Day-to-day Responsibilities Include


 * Creating engaging social media posts and graphics using Canva to promote our services and events.
 * Assisting in the development and implementation of digital marketing campaigns to increase brand awareness and drive traffic to our website.
 * Conducting market research to identify trends and opportunities for growth.
 * Analyzing data from various digital marketing channels to measure the effectiveness of campaigns.
 * Assisting in the management of our company's website and ensuring content is up-to-date and optimized for SEO.
 * Collaborating with the marketing team to brainstorm new ideas and strategies for reaching our target audience.
 * Providing administrative support such as organizing files, scheduling meetings, and responding to customer inquiries.
   
   

If you are a creative and motivated individual with a passion for digital marketing and proficiency in Canva and MS-Office, we invite you to join our team and help us take our marketing efforts to the next level. Apply now and be a part of our dynamic and growing company!
